title: ‘Kiss of the Spider Woman’: Colleen Atwood’s Costumes Were Inspired by Hollywood’s Golden Age of Musicals
summary: Colleen Atwood is no stranger to creating dazzling costumes for musicals, counting such spectacles as“Nine” and “Chicago” among her credits. Now, she can add Bill Condon’s “Kiss of the Spider Woman” to that list. In Condon’s adaptation of the Broadway musical, Atwood crafted a wardrobe for Jennifer…

title: Timothée Chalamet Says ‘No’ to Making TV and Was Disappointed to Lose the Oscar: ‘People Can Call Me a Try-Hard. They Can Say Whatever the F—‘
summary: Timothée Chalamet opened up in a new Vogue cover story about his disappointment when it comes to losing awards. The 29-year-old has lost two Oscars, four Golden Globes and four BAFTA Awards, although he did take home the SAG Award for best actor in February thanks to his performance as Bob Dylan in…
